mapper.select: select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_content ,webtoon_info.webtoon_image from webtoon_info where webtoon_info.webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum}

select PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num,PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME,kor_platform.kor,PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_link from PLATFORM_TABLE,KOR_PLATFORM where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = kor_platform.eng order by WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME

select origin_table.webtoon_num, origin_table.origin_platform_name, KOR_PLATFORM.kor,origin_table.ORIGIN_WEBTOON_LINK from origin_table,KOR_PLATFORM where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and origin_table.origin_platform_name = KOR_PLATFORM.eng order by origin_platform_name
select * from favorites_info where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
select count(webtoon_link) from PLATFORM_TABLE where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum}
mapper.update: update favorites_info set interest = #{interest} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
update favorites_info set FAVORITES = #{favorites} where webtoon_num = #{webtoonNum} and user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: select * from( select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image, PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME,KOR_PLATFORM.kor from PLATFORM_TABLE,webtoon_info,KOR_PLATFORM where PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName} and PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num = webtoon_info.webtoon_num and KOR_PLATFORM.eng = PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title asc )WHERE ROWNUM <= 15

select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image, PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME,KOR_PLATFORM.kor from PLATFORM_TABLE,webtoon_info,KOR_PLATFORM where PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName} and PLATFORM_TABLE.webtoon_num = webtoon_info.webtoon_num and KOR_PLATFORM.eng = PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME
order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title asc
order by webtoon_info.webtoon_title desc
order by webtoon_info.webtoon_hit desc , webtoon_info.webtoon_title asc
WHERE ROWNUM <= 15

select DISTINCT webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title, webtoon_info.webtoon_writer, webtoon_info.webtoon_image,( select count(favorites) from FAVORITES_INFO where FAVORITES_INFO.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and FAVORITES_INFO.favorites = 'T')as count, KOR_PLATFORM.kor from webtoon_info, FAVORITES_INFO,PLATFORM_TABLE,KOR_PLATFORM where webtoon_info.webtoon_num =PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_NUM and PLATFORM_TABLE.WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME = #{platformName} and KOR_PLATFORM.eng = WEBTOON_PLATFORM_NAME order by count desc, webtoon_info.webtoon_title asc WHERE ROWNUM <= 15

select webtoon_info.webtoon_num, webtoon_info.webtoon_title,webtoon_info.webtoon_writer,webtoon_info.webtoon_image,GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre, kor_genre.genre_kor from GENRE_TABLE,webtoon_info,kor_genre where GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_num=webtoon_info.webtoon_num and GENRE_TABLE.webtoon_genre=#{webtoonGenre} and kor_genre.genre_eng = #{webtoonGenre}
